channel.title: 'One Free Man' Signature Tutorial.
channel.description:
._.
'One Free Man' _____________________________________
Hey guys. I've designed this tut to be user/beginner friendly, But y'know. Have a look. Post your outcomes here.
This is how to make:
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
[url='https://shadowblisk.deviantart.com/art/One-Free-Man-Sig-Tut-144654422']![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)[/url] [url]https://shadowblisk.deviantart.com/art/One-Free-Man-Sig-Tut-144654422[/url]
This is for Photoshop, but if anyone wants to adapt it for another program, Please ask me.

item.title: 'One Free Man' Signature Tutorial.
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
Even though the tutorial does show how to make something cliche and already out there enough. One may learn how to use certain tools they didn’t know before or how to apply certain effects in a certain order to get something entirely different then how they may have done it before. I’ve been using Photoshop for seven years now and I still don’t know it all. Great effort and thanks for the upload. The spiderman one is pretty sick too. I am curious though, where do you get your textures from? I have my select few locations and I could always use more. Thanks ahead of time.

Read full topic

item.title: 'One Free Man' Signature Tutorial.
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
Yeah, they could, But everyone knows that those people are just desperate assholes with no creativity whatsoever.

I don’t give a shit if someone wants to rip one of my sigs, Because there’s already a lot of people on other forums who know me, and they do get the biggest flaming possible.

Still, I know what you mean.

~Shrike, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: 'One Free Man' Signature Tutorial.
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
While it is a pretty solid tutorial, anyone wanting to have a sig exactly like these could just copy the image’s URL.

item.title: 'One Free Man' Signature Tutorial.

item.description:
For what it’s worth, I thought it was really good, you can use it as a general tutorial with little to no effort… :rolleyes:

item.title: 'One Free Man' Signature Tutorial.

item.description:
No, I’m sorry. Anyone can feel free to convert it to work with Gimm/Paint.net etc.

I have another tutorial now, On how to make this:

[align=center]
Clicky[/SIZE][/align]

Thanks to those who’ve been supportive. Jeez.

item.description:

make a tutorail that tells me how i made my sig so i can make & use it thanks

the point of the tut is to teach people some cool tricks in Photoshop. not to tell people to make more copies of that sig.

Anyway I think that the tut is good, even though I don’t use photoshop…:fffuuu:
